file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 24-36-01-06 - MAIN BATTERY - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN BATTERY - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section refers you to the publication necessary for you to do the servicing of the Main Battery. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 24-36-01-600-801-A ♦ MAIN BATTERY - SERVICE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 24-36-01 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 24-36-01-600-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. MAIN BATTERY - SERVICE A. General (1) The aircraft has two main batteries installed in the same compartment. (2) The main purpose of the servicing of the main battery is to adjust the electrolyte level. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM TASK 24-36-00-700-801-A/500 MAIN BATTERY SYSTEM - OPERATIONAL TEST AMM TASK 24-36-01-000-801-A/400 MAIN BATTERY - REMOVAL AMM TASK 24-36-01-400-801-A/400 MAIN BATTERY - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 113 113DL LH forward fuselage D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task LH forward fuselage I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-004-A (1) Open access panel 113DL (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). J. Service Main Battery (Figure 601) SUBTASK 610-004-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH MAIN BATTERY SAFT PART NUMBER 442CH1 (1) Remove the main battery (AMM TASK 24-36-01-000-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 600-801-A/600 24-36-01 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Refer to the last revision of the Component Maintenance Manual with Illustrated Parts List for Nickel-Cadmium Battery, part number 442CH1 by SAFT, to service the main battery, as given in the Periodical Check section of this manual. (3) Install the main battery (AMM TASK 24-36-01-400-801-A/400). K. Service Main Battery (Figure 601) SUBTASK 610-005-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH MAIN BATTERY MARATHON TYPE BTSP-4445L, PART NUMBER 32248-001 AND 32845-001 (1) Remove the main battery (AMM TASK 24-36-01-000-801-A/400). (2) This item is applicable to aircraft with main battery Marathon type BTSP-4445L, part number 32248-001. (a) Refer to the last revision of the Component Maintenance Manual with Illustrated Parts List for Nickel-Cadmium Battery, type BTSP-4445L, part number 32248-001 by Marathon Power Technologies Company, to service the main battery, as given in the Battery Maintenance Flow Chart of this manual (Periodical Check). (3) This item is applicable to aircraft with main battery Marathon, part number 32845-001. (a) Refer to the last revision of the Instruction Manual for Micro Maintenance, Nickel- Cadmium Aircraft Batteries, BA-24-34-08, by Marathon Power Technologies Company, to service the main battery, as given in the Battery Maintenance Flow Chart of this manual. (4) Install the main battery (AMM TASK 24-36-01-400-801-A/400). L. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-004-A (1) Do the Operational Test of the Main Battery System ( AMM TASK 24-36-00-700-801- A/500). (2) Close access panel 113DL (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 600-801-A/600 24-36-01 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
